artist: Engraver: Richard Earlom; Draftsman: after Claude de Lorraine; Publisher: Hurst, Robinson & Co.
creditline:
The William M. Ladd Collection
Gift of Herschel V. Jones, 1916
inscription: LL, on image, lettered: Roma 1660 | LL, in margin below image, lettered: Claude delint. / No. 13. | BC, in margin below image, lettered: Pub. Jan. 20. 1802, by J. & J. title: Study of a Soldier Approaching a City
